original_text: Do not leave the entrance to the tent of meeting or you will die, because the Lord’s anointing oil is on you.” So they did as Moses said.
korean_text: 여호와의 관유가 너희에게 있은즉 너희는 회막 문에 나가지 말라 그리하면 죽음을 면하리라 그들이 모세의 말대로 하니라

sentences.original_text: Do not leave the entrance to the tent of meeting
because the Lord's anointing oil is on you
So they did as Moses said
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들은 모세가 말한 대로 행했다
